pr_title: NMS-12843: Remote Poller: add remote polling details to service page

timeline.bodyText: This is confusing. Could we make this currentPerspectiveOutagesForService?
timeline.author: fooker
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -64,6 +64,11 @@
      */
     OnmsOutage currentOutageForService(OnmsMonitoredService service);
 
+    /**
+     * Return all current open outages for the given service be it detected from local or from remote (perspective).
+     */
+    Collection<OnmsOutage> currentOutagesForService(OnmsMonitoredService service);

replies.bodyText: @fooker why do you think this is confusing? It gives all outages back - remote or local.
replies.author: patrick-schweizer

replies.bodyText: The function itself is correct. I found it confusing that it is only used to show outages with perspectives due to filtering for perspective location everywhere it is used.
replies.author: fooker

timeline.author: fooker

timeline.bodyText: A location can be part of multiple services. Therefore this must be made unique.
timeline.author: fooker

replies.author: patrick-schweizer
